summary: The test package for the PlasmaPy particle module provides extensive pytest‑based validation of all particle‑related functionality, including atomic and nuclear utilities, parsing and alias handling, particle factories, decorators, ionization state representations, collection classes, special particle datasets, serialization, and custom exception handling.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, robustness, and proper error handling of the particle subsystem in PlasmaPy, thereby supporting reliable plasma physics simulations and analyses.
